question: How do I activate roaming?
answer: You can activate roaming by dialing *2372# and press 3

question: How do I setup Voicemail?
answer: You will have to contact our agents to setup voicemail

question: How do I borrow money using the lend me service?
answer: You can borrow money through lend me. By dialing *324# and pressing 3.

question: Where can I pay my bill?
answer: You can pay your bill online

question: How to change my wifi password?
answer: You will have to contact our agent to change your wifi password

question: How do I transfer my account to a different owner or address?
answer: You will have to contact our agent to verify your account to make changes to your account

question: How do I contact your agents
answer: You can contact our agents by calling 234-2365 or 231-4367
